item.title: Syllabus
item.description: Course JOURN 8006: Quant Tue 3:30 - 6:00pm Lee Hills Hall 303 Instructor Dr. Michael W. Kearney Tu 10am - 1:00pm Lee Hills Hall 314 Objectives Provide an introduction to quantitative research methods commonly used in the study of journalism and mass communication with specific emphases on the a) formulation of questions, b) study design, c) development of data collection methods, and d) interpretation of data as answers to questions.
